snippet.title: Half-Life 1 - Radical Problems
snippet.description:
The mod has been under work since 2018. The greatest difficulty of it was the motivation to keep working on it, as time passed on. With the help of 2 great and old communities, Valve Modding Community and The Whole Half-Life.

The mod is about a Scientist assigned in Area 9 Facilities, Waste Hazards, named Xenofor Howzen. You are a rather ordinary scientist, that encounters something greater than he could handle.

Mod DB Page: https://www.moddb.com/mods/radical-problems
